Derangement: Compulsive Invisibility: Commonly associated with Obfuscate, the vampire has been so attuned to invisibility that it costs Willpower for him to turn his powers off.[33]
Basic_Information.Name: Dane, Emagene

Skills.Sense the Unseen: The vampire can detect things that are supernaturally invisible

Skills.Compel: The vampire can issue a short sentence command to the target.
Skills.Dementation: Amalgam Obfuscate 2. The vampire can trigger psychotic breaks or nervous breakdowns.

Skills.Chimerstry: The vampire can create brief, but vivid single-sensory hallucinations. Amalgam: Presence 1.
Skills.Cloak of Shadows: The vampire can become invisible while standing motionless.
Skills.Conceal: Amalgam of Auspex 3. The vampire can cloak an inaminate object up to a small building from sight.
Skills.Fata Morgana: The vampire can craft elaborate multisensory hallucinations. Amalgam: Presence 2.
Skills.Ghost in the Machine: Other Obfuscate powers work on electronic recording devices.
Skills.Mask of a Thousand Faces: The vampire can assume the voice and appearance of a generic person who blends in the current setting, i.e. a worker in a factory or a nightwatchman in an office.
Skills.Mental Maze[4]: The Vampire can make the victim unable to escape the building, leaving him feeling that the building folds back on itself. Amalgam: Dominate (VTM) 1.
Skills.Silence of Death: The vampire can nullify all sound that they make.
Skills.Unseen Passage: The vampire can move around while staying invisibleâ€‹.

Skills.Atavism: The vampire can cause an animal to temporarily revert to their primal instincts, forcing them to attack anyone nearby or to flee the scene.
Skills.Bound Famulus: The vampire can form a bond with an animal facilitating the use of other Animalism powers.
Skills.Feral Whispers: The vampire can summon and communicate with an animal.

Skills.A Taste for Blood: By tasting a drop of blood, the user can discern certain basic traits of the one to whom it belongs
Skills.Extinguish Vitae: The user can intentionally remove the unlife-giving properties of some of the Blood in another vampire, stoking their Hunger as the victimâ€™s inner reserves curdle into impotence

Skills.Rapid Reflexes: The vampire suffers no penalty to dodging gunfire without cover.

Skills.Unswayable Mind: The vampire can add their Fortitude rating to dice rolls to resist manipulation and coercion.

Skills.Arms of Ahriman: The vampire summons two-dimensional shadow tendrils which glide across surfaces and victims, alternatively engaging in mystical grapples with the victim's shadow. They attack using the vampire's Wits and Oblivion, benefiting from their Potence when inflicting damage. Multiple tendrils can be created by splitting the vampire's dice pool. Amalgam with Potence 2.
Skills.Ashes to Ashes: The vampire may disintegrate non-Kindred corpses with their vitae, including animated cadavers like those brought to false life with Oblivion.

Skills.Lethal Body: The Kindred can cause serious physical damage to a mortal, capable of tearing skin and breaking bone.
Skills.Prowess: The Kindred gains an overall increase in strength.
Skills.Soaring Leap: The Kindred can leap higher and further.

Skills.Awe: The vampire can add their Presence rating to their Persuasion and Performance checks
Skills.Daunt: The vampire can add their Presence rating to their Intimidation checks.
Skills.Eyes of the Serpent: Amalgam Protean 1.  The vampire can freeze a mortal in place with their gaze.
Skills.Lingering Kiss: The vampire can gain bonuses to their Social pools against targets that they have Kissed.

Skills.Vicissitude: The vampire reshapes one's own skin, muscles, and bone at will. Amalgam: Dominate 2.
Skills.Weight of the Feather: The vampire can reduce their effective mass and density, making themselves almost weightless. This allows them to avoid triggering pressure sensors as well as avoiding major damage from falls, collisions, or being thrown. The power cannot be used for longer leaps, as the vampireâ€™s strength is proportionally reduced.

Skills.Profane Hieros Gamos: User can change their gender or appearance
